jobs.title: Fraud and Risk Manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Fraud and Risk Manager to join our team!

The candidate must have a minimum of 3 yearâ€™s experience in Fraud and Risk, and ideally within the Gambling Industry. The Fraud and Risk Manager would be expected to closely work together with Compliance and Community teams to fulfil their duties, as well as working with other stakeholders where appropriate. 

Duties that will be carried out by the Fraud and Risk Manager will include:


â€¢	Daily management of Risk, Fraud and Payments
â€¢	Management of all possible types of fraud and risk including payment fraud, bonus abuse, affiliate fraud and multi-accounting (creating multiple accounts)
â€¢	Work with payment service providers to resolve end user problems with payments. 
â€¢	Understand and work with different requirements and procedures adhering to individual regulatory requirements.
â€¢	Reporting to Head of Compliance on any findings of fraudulent activity, suspicious activity, blocked/limited transactions and/or accounts. 
o	Help raise SARs reports and requesting defence from NCA or other regulatory body as appropriate in line with the licence affected
â€¢	Help improve the policies and procedures on these specific areas, and on financial transaction checks including confirmation on withdrawals.
â€¢	Work with Head of Compliance and IT teams on development and upgrade of fraud detection/prevention tools and mechanisms.
â€¢	Implementation of procedures for KYC checks, and working with 3rd party KYC providers as well as using several detection techniques to identify high risk accounts, detect unusual activity, investigate and close suspicious accounts to mitigate risk.
o	Investigation using third party service providers, open source information, etc. and create a player profile where there are suspicious or high-risk accounts/unusual activities.
o	Perform and run ad-hoc functions and reports, assess and analyse trends and activities related to all elements of trading
o	Record Keeping.
â€¢	Perform Age Verification checks, KYC checks, EDD checks, SOF/SOW checks and work with third party providers to ensure this is completed
â€¢	Monitor member account registration, deposit and withdrawal transactions.
â€¢	Assess risks of fraud in line with the customer base and the business model
â€¢	Responsible Gambling and Customer Interaction

jobs.title: Front-end Web Engineer
jobs.description:
We're looking for a Front-end Web Engineer to implement and test product features and optimise Midnite's web experiece.
As a front-end engineer at Midnite, you'll work in a close knit team of experts in design, frontend and backend development and quants (yes, we build our own models!!).

*You will:*

* Implement and test product features within a tight feedback loop
* Improve the end customer experience on web
* Write robust, maintainable, testable code in a timely manner throughout the tech stack.


Our tech stack is implemented in python and javascript, is hosted on AWS and includes flask, socketio, postgresql, redis, elasticsearch, SQS, react/vue, and ansible. Our iphone app is written in swift.
All our code is linted, tested and automatically deployed to our test environment. We ship to production multiple times a day.
Knowledge in the above technologies is preferred but not necessary, willingness to get up to speed, being a great problem solver and upholding high engineering standards is what is important to us.


REQUIREMENTS

* 2 or more years experience in working on front-end web development
* Experience with React/Vue and working with websockets
* Design driven and pixel perfect
* Comfortable analysing data to drive marketing/product decisions
* Familiar with startup culture.
* Ideally you'd also be an Esports fan!


*You may fit this role if you:*
* Want to make an impact!
* Thrive in a fast moving environment that only a start up can offer!
* Enjoy working in a collaborative setting involving different stakeholders
* Enjoy participating in brainstorming solutions to problems

BENEFITS

* A ground-floor role in which youâ€™ll be integral to our company culture and help shape the direction of our brand
* To be part of a growing community of Midnite employees, partners, investors, and advisors, all focused on our mission of building the future of esports betting.
* Competitive equity and salary compensation (Â£45,000 to Â£65,000)
* Office in central London near Leather Lane food market in Farringdon
* Our team combines years of experience building world-class betting technology with deep esports domain expertise. We are as intentional about building a durable company and inclusive culture as we are about perfecting our product, and are serious about flexible work and professional development.

Apply below or by sending resume to careers@midnite.com

jobs.title: Senior Software Backend Engineer
jobs.description:
We're looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to take ownership of all backend development.

As a backend software engineer at Midnite, you'll work in a close knit team of experts in design, frontend development and quants (yes, we build our own models!!).


You will:

* Write robust, maintainable, testable code in a timely manner (we move very fast!).
* Ensure technical architecture is consistent with our roadmap.
* Implement our own proprietary pricing models!
* Uphold high engineering standards and bring consistency to the codebase and processes you will encounter.
* Provide mentorship to your colleagues.
* Help us hire great software engineers.


Our tech stack is implemented in python and javascript, is hosted on AWS and includes flask, socketio, postgresql, redis, elasticsearch, SQS and ansible. Our iphone app is written in swift.

All our code is linted, tested and automatically deployed to our test environment. We ship to production multiple times a day.

Knowledge in the above technologies is preferred but not necessary, willingness to get up to speed, being a great problem solver and upholding high engineering standards is what is important to us.


Requirements

* 5 or more years experience in working with web based applications at pace.
* Worked with top in class team and experience scaling products.
* Familiar with startup culture.
* Ideally you'd also be an Esports fan!


You may fit this role if you:

* Want to make an impact!
* Thrive in a fast moving environment that only a start up can offer!
* Help build a team
* Enjoy working in a collaborative setting involving different stakeholders
* Enjoy participating in brainstorming solutions to problems

* A ground-floor role in which youâ€™ll be integral to our company culture and help shape the direction of our brand
